title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 09, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 09, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Cheminformatics
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Machine Learning

*   [Chemprop (⭐2k)](https://github.com/chemprop/chemprop) - Directed message passing neural networks for property prediction of molecules and reactions with uncertainty and interpretation.

### Libraries / Docking

*   [DOCKSTRING (⭐172)](https://github.com/dockstring/dockstring) - Automates and standardizes ligand preparation for AutoDock Vina.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • Chemprop (⭐2k) - Directed message passing neural networks for property prediction of molecules and reactions with uncertainty and interpretation.

Libraries / Docking

  • DOCKSTRING (⭐172) - Automates and standardizes ligand preparation for AutoDock Vina.

items.title: Awesome Software Patreons
items.content_text:
### Open Source Projects

*   [NewPipe](https://liberapay.com/TeamNewPipe) - FLOSS video player on Android for services like YouTube, Soundcloud etc.

### Open Source Projects / Libraries

*   [Iced](https://github.com/sponsors/hecrj), [#2](https://ko-fi.com/hecrj_) - A cross-platform GUI library for Rust, inspired by Elm.

### Open Source Projects / Hardware related

*   [Martin Povišer](https://github.com/sponsors/povik) - Reverse-engineering and writing Linux drivers for audio hardware on Apple Silicon Macs.

### Other kinds of content / Articles and Tutorials

*   [GamingOnLinux](https://www.patreon.com/liamdawe) - articles and videos about Linux, Steam Deck, SteamOS gaming.
items.content_html:
Open Source Projects

  • NewPipe - FLOSS video player on Android for services like YouTube, Soundcloud etc.

Open Source Projects / Libraries

  • Iced, #2 - A cross-platform GUI library for Rust, inspired by Elm.

Open Source Projects / Hardware related

  • Martin Povišer - Reverse-engineering and writing Linux drivers for audio hardware on Apple Silicon Macs.

Other kinds of content / Articles and Tutorials

  • GamingOnLinux - articles and videos about Linux, Steam Deck, SteamOS gaming.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Large Language Models (LLMs)

*   [Falcon LLM - Home](https://falconllm.tii.ae/): a foundational large language model (LLM) with 40 billion parameters trained on one trillion tokens shared by Technology Innovation Institute from Abu Dhabi
items.content_html:
Large Language Models (LLMs)

  • Falcon LLM - Home: a foundational large language model (LLM) with 40 billion parameters trained on one trillion tokens shared by Technology Innovation Institute from Abu Dhabi

items.title: Awesome Elixir
items.content_text:
### Editors

*   [Jetbrains (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/KronicDeth/intellij-elixir) - Elixir for IntelliJ IDEA, RubyMine, WebStorm, PhpStorm, PyCharm, AppCode, Android Studio, 0xDBE.
items.content_html:
Editors

  • Jetbrains (⭐1.9k) - Elixir for IntelliJ IDEA, RubyMine, WebStorm, PhpStorm, PyCharm, AppCode, Android Studio, 0xDBE.

items.title: Awesome Billing
items.content_text:
### History / Cloud providers

*   “Larry Page went to U of M and used the Michigan Terminal System. (…) when Google was working on App Engine, Page took inspiration from MTS and would exhort engineers to follow its example. (…) when I look at my AWS and GCP bills now, it feels very familiar!” ([source](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=35123587)) - The direct filiation between old-school university mainframes and current cloud services.
*   [The vanished grandeur of accounting](https://www.bostonglobe.com/ideas/2014/06/07/the-vanished-grandeur-accounting/3zcbRBoPDNIryWyNYNMvbO/story.html) - Accounting paintings were a significant genre in Dutch art.

### Humour / Cloud providers

*   [Detax](https://detax.framer.website) - A site mockup of an tax avoidance product for small businesses.
items.content_html:
History / Cloud providers

  • “Larry Page went to U of M and used the Michigan Terminal System. (…) when Google was working on App Engine, Page took inspiration from MTS and would exhort engineers to follow its example. (…) when I look at my AWS and GCP bills now, it feels very familiar!” (source) - The direct filiation between old-school university mainframes and current cloud services.
  • The vanished grandeur of accounting - Accounting paintings were a significant genre in Dutch art.

Humour / Cloud providers

  • Detax - A site mockup of an tax avoidance product for small businesses.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Blog posts / Miscellaneous

*   [Pandas vs Polars – Speed Comparison](https://stuffbyyuki.com/pandas-vs-polars-speed-comparison/) - A blog post that compares the performance of Polars, Pandas and Pandas 2.0 by [@StuffbyYuki](https://github.com/StuffbyYuki). Code used is available on Github [here (⭐26)](https://github.com/StuffbyYuki/Python-Polars-Tips-and-Tricks/tree/main/pandas_vs_polars).
items.content_html:
Blog posts / Miscellaneous

  • Pandas vs Polars – Speed Comparison - A blog post that compares the performance of Polars, Pandas and Pandas 2.0 by @StuffbyYuki. Code used is available on Github here (⭐26).

items.title: Awesome Electron
items.content_text:
### For Electron / Other

*   [Hydraulic Conveyor](https://hydraulic.dev) - CLI tool that deploys apps without needing any special update servers, multi-platform CI, or code changes.
items.content_html:
For Electron / Other

  • Hydraulic Conveyor - CLI tool that deploys apps without needing any special update servers, multi-platform CI, or code changes.

items.title: Awesome Langchain
items.content_text:
### Tools / Services

*   [Gorilla (⭐12k)](https://github.com/ShishirPatil/gorilla): An API store for LLMs ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ShishirPatil/gorilla?style=social)

### Tools / Agents

*   [CollosalAI Chat (⭐41k)](https://github.com/hpcaitech/ColossalAI/tree/main/applications/Chat): implement LLM with RLHF, powered by the Colossal-AI project ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hpcaitech/ColossalAI?style=social)
*   [Local GPT (⭐21k)](https://github.com/PromtEngineer/localGPT): Inspired on Private GPT with the GPT4ALL model replaced with the Vicuna-7B model and using the InstructorEmbeddings instead of LlamaEmbeddings ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/PromtEngineer/localGPT?style=social)
*   [Voyager (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/MineDojo/Voyager): An Open-Ended Embodied Agent with Large Language Models ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/MineDojo/Voyager?style=social)
*   [ix (⭐1k)](https://github.com/kreneskyp/ix): Autonomous GPT-4 agent platform ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/kreneskyp/ix?style=social)

### Open Source Projects / Knowledge Management

*   [Quiver (⭐38k)](https://github.com/StanGirard/quiver): Dump your brain into your GenerativeAI Vault ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/StanGirard/quiver?style=social)
*   [Anything LLM (⭐46k)](https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm): A full-stack application that turns any documents into an intelligent chatbot with a sleek UI and easier way to manage your workspaces. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm?style=social)

### Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

*   [ReLLM (⭐509)](https://github.com/r2d4/rellm): Regular Expressions for Language Model Completions. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/r2d4/rellm?style=social)
*   [OpenDAN (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/fiatrete/OpenDAN-Personal-AI-OS): open source Personal AI OS , which consolidates various AI modules in one place for your personal use. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/fiatrete/OpenDAN-Personal-AI-OS?style=social)
items.content_html:
Tools / Services

  • Gorilla (⭐12k): An API store for LLMs

Tools / Agents

  • CollosalAI Chat (⭐41k): implement LLM with RLHF, powered by the Colossal-AI project
  • Local GPT (⭐21k): Inspired on Private GPT with the GPT4ALL model replaced with the Vicuna-7B model and using the InstructorEmbeddings instead of LlamaEmbeddings
  • Voyager (⭐6.2k): An Open-Ended Embodied Agent with Large Language Models
  • ix (⭐1k): Autonomous GPT-4 agent platform

Open Source Projects / Knowledge Management

  • Quiver (⭐38k): Dump your brain into your GenerativeAI Vault
  • Anything LLM (⭐46k): A full-stack application that turns any documents into an intelligent chatbot with a sleek UI and easier way to manage your workspaces.

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • ReLLM (⭐509): Regular Expressions for Language Model Completions.
  • OpenDAN (⭐1.9k): open source Personal AI OS , which consolidates various AI modules in one place for your personal use.
